title: What makes Qlozet different
subtitle: Four pillars unify our ecosystem—precision, personalization, productivity, and trust.

items.title: Precision Fit
items.description: AI-assisted body measurement using computer vision anchors and regression models to estimate key girths and lengths with explainable overlays.

items.title: Personalized Styles
items.description: Configurable style options (neckline, sleeves, length, closures, trims) with vendor-verified defaults and pricing logic.

items.title: Unified Workflow
items.description: From inspiration to fabric selection, bespoke order, production tracking, QC, and delivery—managed in one place.

items.title: Trust & Safety
items.description: KYC'd vendors, QC checklists, dispute resolution, escrow options, and privacy-respecting data controls.
